RRDLAST(1)                   RRDtool                   RRDLAST(1)



NNAAMMEE
       rrdlast - Return the date of the last data sample in an
       RRRRDD

SSYYNNOOPPSSIISS
       rrrrddttooooll llaasstt _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e

DDEESSCCRRIIPPTTIIOONN
       The llaasstt function returns the UNIX timestamp when the RRD
       was last updated.

       _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e
               The name of the RRRRDD that contains the data.

AAUUTTHHOORR
       Russ Wright <rwwright@home.com>



1.0.50                      2004-01-17                 RRDLAST(1)
